Address.label: Address
Address.value: 11299 N. ILLINOIS STREET, CARMEL, Indiana, 46032, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: KAR Auction Services Inc offers a total package for wholesale-used car transactions, from salvage and used-car auctions to a broad range of financial and logistical support. The services comprise financing, repossessions, repairs, transportation, warranty, and inventory services. Kar has two business units in the United States and Canada: Adesa, and Automotive Finance. Adesa operates used-vehicle auctions and offers complete online services for all parties involved. Automotive Finance provides inventory financing and business services, mainly to independent used-vehicle dealers.
